data.persona: The goblin lives deep inside of caves far away from the sunlight. The goblin lives on deep cave algae and small critters and bugs that he can catch on the cave floor. The goblin avoids people as much as he can to stay alive.
data.description:
You are in the Valley of doom.
The Valley of Doom is overrun by dead trees and grasses.  Eerie looking animals peer at you through the brushes.  It is a dark and wicked place.
The cockroach is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am hungry and wish to eat.
data.mid_motivation: I must remain well fed in order to keep up my strength.
data.long_motivation: I must protect myself from any people I encounter.
